description:
Terminator 5 is moving from the rumor bin to reality as Skydance Productions, Annapurna Pictures and Paramount Pictures have announced a June 26, 2015 release for the fifth film in the franchise described as the first film in a new "standalone trilogy" with Laeta Kalorgridis (Avatar, Shutter Island) and Patrick Lussier (Drive Angry) attached to write the screenplay.传闻《终结者5》要回归大荧幕的消息终于成真了！天舞影业、安纳布尔纳影业和派拉蒙已经正式宣布将开始制作《终结者5》，并会于2015年上映，这部续集将是一部全新的、独立的终结者三部曲的第一部。由莱塔·卡罗格里迪斯（《阿凡达》监制，《禁闭岛》编剧）和帕特里克·露西尔（《狂暴飞车》编剧）撰写剧本。

Arnold Schwarzenegger will return in the title role, but in what capacity is still unclear.阿诺德·施瓦辛格将会继续出演，但是他的戏份有多少暂时还不知道。

Schwarzenegger confirmed his participation earlier this month saying, "I'm very happy that the studios want me to be in Terminator 5 and to star as the Terminator, which we start shooting in January."施瓦辛格这个月早些时候也确认了这一消息：“我很开心制作组还想让我在《终结者5》中继续出演终结者一角，我们将在1月份开机。”
